    "SSRewardText": "There are notable similarities between the crest you discovered in Senenthia and the symbols on the wall, so you decide to take your time to try and read them.\n\nThe text is written in both Ulminian and Senenthian, accompanied by icons for those who cannot read. Thanks to this, you are able to understand the story it tells: it describes the cooperation between Senenthian House Micral and the people of Ulminin during a great famine that ravaged the desert.\n\nHouse Micral, already bound to Ulminin by cultural and commercial ties, dedicated all their resources to aiding the people of Ulminin when the famine struck, distributing food freely to those in need.\n\nIn gratitude, the people of Ulminin engraved this story onto the walls so that everyone would remember House Micral's generosity and kindness.",

    "SSRewardText": "There are notable similarities between the crest you discovered in Senenthia and the symbols on the wall, so you decide to take your time to try and read them.\n\nThe text is written in both Ulminian and Senenthian, accompanied by icons for those who cannot read. Thanks to this, you are able to understand the story it tells: it describes the cooperation between Senenthian House Micral and the people of Ulminin during a great famine that ravaged the desert.\n\nHouse Micral, already bound to Ulminin by cultural and commercial ties, dedicated all their resources to aiding the people of Ulminin when the famine struck, distributing food freely to those in need.\n\nIn gratitude, the people of Ulminin engraved this story onto the walls so that everyone would remember House Micral's generosity and kindness.",

    "SSRewardText": "(Andrin): \"The symbol on the wall looks like the emblem of House Micral. I spent some time with my cousin Zach Micral, and I’ve never met anyone gentler or more generous! His house is renowned for helping those in need and never boasting about their deeds. I wasn’t aware of this particular story in Ulminin.\r\n\nBut I’m certain the crest we found in Senenthia does not represent House Micral. We should search for a place with old records of the Casthak lineage... but where?\"\r\n\nBefore leaving, you notice a small chapel containing some shards for those in need, serving as a reminder of House Micral’s generosity.     "SSRewardText": "(Ottis): \"This wall tells the story of how the Senenthian noble House Micral came to the rescue of the Ulminin people during a famine that struck this area some time ago. We should search for a place with old records of the Casthak lineage... but where?\"\r\n\nBefore leaving, you notice a small chapel containing some shards for those in need, serving as a reminder of House Micral’s generosity.
